answers.answer: Hi there!Recurrent infection and boils occur in diabetes with uncontrolled blood sugar levels and reduced immunity. Strict Control of blood sugar levels is essential as a part of treatment along with topical or systemic antibiotics as required. I would advise getting it examined by your doctor for appropriate management.Hope this helps.Take care!

question: small pimple like bump on groin area or under the arm pit. grows bigger to like a boil very painful once it gets big it develops a hole in the center will last up to 4 weeks
title: Painful bumps
